creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; two men standing in ULQ--one man wears a red V-neck shirt, brown pants and orange shoes, other man wears blue hat, striped shirt in red, pink and white, and blue pants; orange water tower with brown ladder and yellow supports in URQ; tree between men and water tower; yellow and black railroad tracks at bottom; red and black borders
inscription: on back in black ink: 738 | on back in pencil: EA 27
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Two Men, Tracks and Water Tower
